text.more:
A network representation of all genres in our Wikipedia corpus. (Both training and testing.) Each node is a genre tag used in the corpus. 

Two nodes are connected if those two genres were both used in the same artist's metadata 
(E.g., Lady Gaga is listed as "Pop • dance • electronic". This would make 3 node-pairs and edges: [ [pop,dance], [pop, electronic], [dance,electronic]])

Communities/colors ("Cluter-ID") are determined by the Leiden-Grivan algorithm.
Node size is determined by Degree.
Edge-weight is a count of how many times that genre pair occurs in our corpus.
text.title: Wikipedia Full Corpus Genre Network
